title: font id please
content:
Does anyone know this font?  
Thanks in advance!  
Carrie

author: carriedrazin

comments.content:
Almost certainly hand-drawn as part of the entire logo.

BTW, in the future, you really should post these requests on the Type ID Board: [http://typophile.com/forum/29](http://web.archive.org/web/20081023163128/http:/typophile.com/forum/29 "http://typophile.com/forum/29") — made just for this sort of thing. You’ll get better, faster responses.
